Articles.Content:
Presenting my newest shuttle, the Horrocks class. Its a very small 1 person craft capable of a Minmus roundtrip with fuel to spare. It can take off and land vertically as well as flying horizontally. It has 4 engines: a basic jet, a tourbojet, a nuclear engine and 2 small vtol engines. Its called the Horrocks class after an astronomer called Jeremiah Horrocks who was the first person to demonstrate that the moon orbited the earth elliptically.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Key bindings:

1. Basic jet (vtol engine)

2. Turbojet

3. Toggle air intakes

4. Nuclear engine

5. Non atmospheric vtol engine.

Flight profile:

1. Press 1 and 2 and throttle up untill you reach 60m/s or so.

2. Pitch up to 40- 50 degrees and press 1.

3 At 26,000m pitch down to between 0- 30 degrees to gain speed.

4. At about 47,000m you should flame out when you do press 2 and 3 and reduce throttle. Press 4 to activate the Lv-n engine.

5. Get a circular orbit.

6. Flight profile including Minmus trip is in the Imgur album.

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/zyr7qsaczond4yc/Mrmcp1%20Horrocks%20Type%201a%20shuttle.craft

Any comments or criticism will be appreciated. Hope you like it.

Edited January 28, 2014 by mrmcp1

Another fine addition to the SSI fleet by a master Shuttlecraft engineer. Well done! I'll be updating the General Catalog soon.

edit. added to the General Catalog!

Edited January 28, 2014 by inigma
